sentence.Network_en: The understandings of these aimed at the development of the CD - R dye.

sentence.Network_en: Homemading of dye can reduce the cost of CD - R greatly .
sentence.Network_cn: 染料国产化可大大压缩 CD—R 成本.

sentence.Network_en: However, there are many different aspencts between CD - R and DVD - R, They both need perfect quality control.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管CD -R 和DVD-R之间存在着很多的不同, 它们都需要完善的品质控制.

entry.def: A CD-R is a CD which is capable of recording sound and images, for example from another CD or from the Internet. CD-R is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'compact disc recordable'.

means.word_mean: 1. a compact disc on which you can write only once and thereafter is read-only memory
